title: Dead by Daylight outage disrupts 2v8 event, developers offer 5 million Bloodpoints compensation: Here's how to redeem them - The Economic Times
text: Dead by Daylight players experienced a significant service outage that impacted gameplay during the highly anticipated 2v8 Event on August 20, 2025, preventing participants from fully enjoying this popular asymmetric multiplayer mode. The outage, reported by hundreds of players worldwide, disrupted matchmaking and game launches, with some facing login issues and high latency during the event window.Outage details and impactThe disruption began a day before the compensation announcement and lasted for approximately two hours, affecting all platforms according to multiple user reports and outage tracking services. Players reported issues such as failure to launch the game, inability to join matches, and frequent disconnects or queuing failures. This incident caused considerable frustration amid the 2v8 event period, which was scheduled to run from August 19 to September 2, 2025.Developer response and compensationBehaviour Interactive, the studio behind Dead by Daylight, acknowledged the outage promptly. Through official social media updates, including an X (formerly Twitter) post on August 20, the team apologized for the inconvenience caused. To compensate for the lost gameplay opportunity during the 2v8 Event, they issued a generous compensation package of 5 million Bloodpoints, the in-game currency used to progress and unlock items.Players were advised to claim this compensation from their in-game inbox, available from the announcement date until September 2, 2025, at 11 a.m. ET. This action aims to restore goodwill and enable players to make up for lost time and progression in the game.Importance of Bloodpoints and player economyIn Dead by Daylight, Bloodpoints are vital for character customization, leveling up, and acquiring perks or offerings. A 5 million Bloodpoints compensation represents a significant amount, reflecting the developers' commitment to valuing player time and engagement despite technical setbacks.FAQâ€™sQ. What caused the Dead by Daylight outage on August 20, 2025?Behaviour Interactive has not publicly detailed the exact technical cause, but reports indicate server and matchmaking system disruptions affecting multiple platforms.Q. How long did the downtime last?The outage lasted around two hours before services were restored.Q. What is the 2v8 Event in Dead by Daylight?The 2v8 Event is a special game mode where two survivors face off against eight killers, adding an intense asymmetric multiplayer challenge.Q. How to claim the 5 million Bloodpoints compensation?Players need to log into Dead by Daylight and check their in-game inbox to retrieve the Bloodpoints, available until September 2, 2025, at 11 AM ET.
